segments.text: I notice the girl standing by the boy, looking at him with those eager eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s got her little hand raised, almost pleading for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s adorable, really, the way they work together without a single word.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I feel a twinge of worry when I see the unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the woman would just turn around and see what’s happening right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't quite believe how oblivious she is; it's like she's in a bubble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think if she knew, she’d be furious about their little cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR
